plot: A presenter invents a radio quiz in which the contestants have to recognize a popular tune disguised as a classical one. Lots of people take part in the contest.
title: Motivo in maschera
plot_es: A presenter invents a radio quiz in which the contestants have to recognize a popular tune disguised as a classical one. Lots of people take part in the contest.
plot_en: A presenter invents a radio quiz in which the contestants have to recognize a popular tune disguised as a classical one. Lots of people take part in the contest.
